plugin.name: ðŸ“’ np.Templating
plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
2.0.0-alpha.13: fix edge case in self-running templates.
np:append takes template name; Adding support for self-running templates via x-callback
plugin.author: Mike Erickson (@codedungeon)

plugin.commands.name: np:append
plugin.commands.description: Append template to end of current note

plugin.commands.name: np:invoke
plugin.commands.description: Place template using <location> attribute in template

plugin.commands.name: np:new
plugin.commands.description: Create new note with title, using folder attribute

plugin.commands.name: np:qtn
plugin.commands.description: Create new note based on Quick Note Template

plugin.commands.name: np:mtn
plugin.commands.description: Create new note based on Meeting Note Template

plugin.commands.name: np:convert
plugin.commands.description: Convert Project Note to Frontmatter format

plugin.commands.name: np:tft
plugin.commands.description: Run a template file by title/preset

plugin.commands.name: templateRunner
plugin.commands.description: Load and run self-contained template instructions with arguments

plugin.settings.title: Template Locale
plugin.settings.description:
Locale used by np.Templating Modules (leave blank for system locale)

Default: <system>

plugin.settings.title: Group Templates by Folder
plugin.settings.description: Group Templates by Folder in Template Chooser

plugin.settings.title: Date Format
plugin.settings.description:
Default date format (may be overridden in desired DateModule method)

Default: short

plugin.settings.title: Time Format
plugin.settings.description:
Default time format (may be overridden in desired TimeModule method)

Default: short

plugin.settings.title: Timestamp Format
plugin.settings.description:
Default format when using date.timestamp()

Default: YYYY-MM-DD h:mm A

plugin.settings.title: Weather Format
plugin.settings.description:
Note: Leave blank for default weather response

You can customize the weather output by providing a custom format string which may include placeholders for different pieces from weather response

Refer to np.Templating documention for list of available placeholders.

plugin.settings.title: Web Services
plugin.settings.description:
Configuration for Services which can be referenced using
<% web.service() %> method

Tip: Use https://jsonformatter.org/json5-validator to validate

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much loggin output will be displayed when executing np.Templating commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG Show All Logs
 - INFO Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR Only Show Errors
 - none Silence Logs
